alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS ARE POSSIBLE ACROSS MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... Conditions are favorable for the development of strong thunderstorms over the next couple of hours. Winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible. Strong, gusty winds will be capable of producing areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Freeman, Big Horn, and Kaka. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 91 and 151. AZ Route 238 near mile marker 1. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 121. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
